Serialized Form

  • Package chess

    • Class chess.Board extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • gameItteration
          int gameItteration
          Number of turns that have been played. Diverges from the Chess.gameItteration by 1 when testing possible moves in Check detection methods
        • layout
          Piece[][] layout
          Stores the representation of the grid of a chess Board as an 8 by 8 Piece double-array. The first index corresponds to the File (or the ith or y-position) The second index corresponds to the Rank (or the jth or x-position)
        • state
          int state
          State of the chess game: In Game: -1, White Wins: 0, Black Wins: 1, Draw: 2
        • stringBoard
          java.lang.String[][] stringBoard
          Stores a visual representation of the grid of a chess Board as an 8 by 8 ASCII double-array Rendered from the Board.render method from Board.layout

    • Class chess.IllegalMoveException extends java.lang.Exception implements Serializable

    • Class chess.Piece extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • ParentBoard
          Board ParentBoard
          The chess Board that the Piece is stored in
        • pos
          Position pos
          The Piece's position for it's location on the board Matches the Board's layout's yth xth indexical reference for the Piece.
        • side
          int side
          The Piece's team/side (0: white, 1: black)

  • Package geometry

    • Class geometry.Position extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • x
          int x
          the x coordinate of the Position. Corresponds to Piece's Rank.
        • y
          int y
          the y coordinate of the Position. Corresponds to Piece's File.

  • Package pieces

    • Class pieces.Bishop extends Piece implements Serializable

    • Class pieces.King extends Piece implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • castleBar
          int castleBar
          File a King starts out on. 0 or 7 (corresponding to File 1 or File 8), which is the yth index the King starts out on.
        • hasMoved
          boolean hasMoved
          Stores whether a King has moved

    • Class pieces.Knight extends Piece implements Serializable

    • Class pieces.Pawn extends Piece implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • hasMoved
          boolean hasMoved
          Stores whether a Pawn has moved
        • moveDirectionDelta
          int moveDirectionDelta
          The y-direction a Pawn moves in, 1 for white, -1 for black
        • passantItteration
          int passantItteration
          Stores the ParentBoard.gameItteration (the turn number) that a Pawn took a 2-step move on
        • promotion_bar
          int promotion_bar
          File a Pawn must reach to be promoted. 0 or 7 (corresponding to File 1 or File 8), which is the yth index of Board.layout a Pawn must reach to be promoted.

    • Class pieces.Queen extends Piece implements Serializable

    • Class pieces.Rook extends Piece implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • hasMoved
          boolean hasMoved
          Stores whether a Rook has moved
